item.title: Opinion Poll by Promocija Plus for HRT, 15–18 February 2025 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
Opinion Poll by Promocija Plus for HRT, 15–18 February 2025 – Voting Intentions
item.description:

  • Radnička fronta (GUE/NGL): 0.7–2.2%
